short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The EAC Plugin enable your browser to support the technology Email Active Content developped by AppInMail in various WebMail client.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: EAC Technology transform your email into a powerful platform. It makes your email more secure, interactive and dynamic.
